docs.snippet: A top global athletics official said she took up her role at the international athletics body IAAF in 2011 with her "eyes wide open" about problems of doping, but found efforts to reform the organization parried at every turn....
docs.lead_paragraph: A top global athletics official said she took up her role at the international athletics body IAAF in 2011 with her "eyes wide open" about problems of doping, but found efforts to reform the organization parried at every turn.

headline.main: IAAF Official Says Reform Efforts Parried at Every Turn
headline.print_headline: IAAF Official Says Reform Efforts Parried at Every Turn

docs.snippet: As international powers intensify military and diplomatic activities in Syria, residents in besieged areas have gone without access to food and medicine....
docs.lead_paragraph: As international powers intensify military and diplomatic activities in Syria, residents in besieged areas have gone without access to food and medicine.
docs.abstract: International humanitarian workers report malnutrition has spiked as cause of death in Syrian towns like Madaya, near Lebanese border, where residents are starving due to siege on town by pro-government forces; many residents in town like Madaya, where humanitarian aid cannot reach trapped citizens, have abandoned thoughts of political change in face of hunger, sign of utter failure of international powers to resolve conflict.

headline.main: Starving Syrians in Madaya Are Denied Aid Amid Political Jockeying
headline.print_headline: Starving Syrians Go Without Aid as Powers Feud

byline.contributor: Anne Barnard and Hwaida Saad reported from Beirut, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations. Thomas Erdbrink contributed reporting from Tehran.
byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD, HWAIDA SAAD and SOMINI SENGUPTA

docs.snippet: Nestle is investing in U.S.-based Seres Therapeutics for a third time in a year, this time injecting $120 million (82.49 million pound) to develop and commercialise medicines aimed at restoring a healthy bacterialogical balance in the human digest...

docs.snippet: Besides its nuclear plans, Tehran has been advancing the capabilities of its ballistic missiles....
docs.lead_paragraph: Besides its nuclear plans, Tehran has been advancing the capabilities of its ballistic missiles.
docs.abstract: Editorial argues United States should impose new sanctions on Iran after its testing of ballistic missiles in violation of United Nations resolutions, even as it lifts others according to terms of recent nuclear deal; suggests Obama administration consider waiting until Iran meets final obligations of nuclear accord, releases journalist Jason Rezaian and current Shiite-Sunni conflict in region settles down.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament

docs.snippet: Iran has removed the core of its Arak heavy water nuclear reactor and filled it with cement as required under a nuclear deal signed with world powers last year, the semi-official Fars news agency said on Monday, citing an informed Iranian source....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran has removed the core of its Arak heavy water nuclear reactor and filled it with cement as required under a nuclear deal signed with world powers last year, the semi-official Fars news agency said on Monday, citing an informed Iranian source.
